email_text:
Subject: Announcement of Company Wellness Day

Dear [Company Name] Employees,

I am pleased to announce that [Company Name] will be hosting a Wellness Day for all employees on [Date]. This day is dedicated to promoting health and wellness within our workplace and providing resources for maintaining a healthy lifestyle.

During the Wellness Day, employees will have the opportunity to participate in various activities and workshops focused on physical, mental, and emotional well-being. We will also be offering healthy snacks and refreshments throughout the day.

Please mark your calendars and plan to join us for this special event. More details about the schedule and activities will be provided in the coming weeks.

Thank you for your continued dedication to [Company Name] and your commitment to maintaining a healthy work-life balance. We look forward to seeing you at the Wellness Day!

Best regards,

[HR Manager's Name]
[Company Name] HR Department
